cli.programDescription: SkyPilot (unofficial) CLI and Ink TUI for OpenAI's Sora 2 video workflows
cli.command.create.description: Create a new video generation job
cli.command.download.description: Download generated assets (video, thumbnail, spritesheet, or all)
cli.command.remix.description: Create a remix of an existing video
cli.command.currency.description: Get or set the preferred currency for cost estimates (ISO 4217 code)
cli.command.currency.argument: Currency code, e.g. USD, EUR, JPY
cli.command.language.description: Get or set the interface language
cli.option.order: Order of results: asc or desc (default desc)
cli.option.json: Output JSON instead of formatted text
cli.option.prompt: Prompt text to generate the video
cli.option.inputReference: Optional reference image to steer generation
cli.option.watch: Poll the API until the job completes
cli.option.download: Download the selected asset when generation completes
cli.option.downloadAsset: Asset to download when generation completes
cli.option.remixPrompt: Prompt text to use for the remix
cli.option.jsonRemix: Return the raw JSON payload from the remix request
cli.option.currencyCode: Currency code, e.g. USD, EUR, JPY
cli.option.jsonCreate: Return the raw JSON payload from the create request
cli.message.costUnavailable: Cost: pricing information unavailable for this model/size combination.
cli.message.currencyCodeInvalid: Currency code must be a three-letter ISO 4217 code.
cli.message.currencyFallback: Currency {requested} is not fully supported; falling back to {actual}.
